description: The schedule for PAX Unplugged 2024, the largest tabletop gaming event on the East Coast, has been announced ahead of its return to the Pennsylvania Convention Center from Friday, December 6, to Sunday, December 8, 2024. Organized by ReedPop and Penny Arcade, the event will feature a wide range of panels, live shows, and gaming...
title: PAX Unplugged 2024 Reveals Full Event Schedule for December

description: Despite the highly anticipated release of the 2024 Player’s Handbook, the Dungeons & Dragons brand appears to be struggling to make a significant impact on Hasbro’s bottom line. While strong sales initially prompted a second print run, Hasbro’s Q3 earnings report suggests that the launch may have underperformed, as D&D failed to receive much attention...
title: Hasbro’s Q3 Report Shows Decline in D&D Revenue Despite 2024 Launch
